entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
